overview: Love triangles often provoke the most unpredictable behavior. Will anybody end up happily in love at the end of this amorous debacle? One outrageous scene after another leads to a series of romantic escapades that will leave viewers bewitched, bewildered, and thoroughly entertained.
tagline: Lisa's a pool shark in paradise with only one problem... Her boyfriend is her girlfriend's husband.
title: Bye Bye Baby
